summary: Diff adds backend maintenance-mode state (siteLive) with admin-only setter and a frontend gate that shows a maintenance screen for non-/admin routes when the site is offline. It also adds in-app domain configuration guidance on the Setup Checklist page and updates DEPLOYMENT.md with maintenance mode documentation. Several additional unrelated frontend styling/marketing changes are present in the diff summary.

missing_requirements.requirement: Admin-only /admin/blogs page provides an explicit English-labeled “Unpublish / Take site offline” control (not just a generic toggle), shows a success confirmation, and includes explanatory English text that this is application-level maintenance mode and does not roll back the deployed canister version.
missing_requirements.reason: The /admin/blogs implementation is truncated right where the offline action handler begins, so the diff summary does not provide enough evidence that the UI includes (a) an explicit unpublish/take-offline labeled action (as opposed to only a Switch), (b) a success confirmation for the take-offline action, and (c) the required explanatory text in the admin UI.

missing_requirements.requirement: DEPLOYMENT.md includes a complete step-by-step domain change section explicitly mentioning VITE_PUBLIC_DOMAIN and calling out the standalone landing page domain configuration location (frontend/static/growwithtutor-standalone/index.html).
missing_requirements.reason: DEPLOYMENT.md is truncated partway through the “Changing the Domain” section; the provided excerpt does not show explicit mention of VITE_PUBLIC_DOMAIN or the standalone landing page configuration path, so completeness cannot be verified from the diff summary.
